name: Unstackable (Oddly Shaped Pixels)
description:
When the worst property developer decides to invest  on a remote and inaccessible island, you and your tugboat are the only ones who can help and build the most charming housing project.

Pick up the buildings and send them flying on the island so that people can start moving in right away (or not)...

Game made in 72 hours for #LD49 (Unstable)

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/unstackable-2

Have you ever throw houses from a ship to an island in order to build a city on it? No you did not! But now, you will!

Gather buildings, throw them on the island, and try to match them to create bigger and better buildings!

Score the most as you can in 200 seconds, and show your friends that you are the best Shitty Builder!

P.S : be careful, the houses may not be as stable as you think…

CONTROLS

Move the ship: WASD

Target & Throw: Mouse left button drag then click

CREDITS

Cédric Delacroix (https://twitter.com/Delacroix_GD)

(first time on Unreal Engine!)

CHANGELOG

1.0.1: Bug fixes (trajectory disappearing, building not upgrading when colliding, building spawning offscreen)

1.0.0: Initial LudumDare version
